results.description: Severe damage to the keel of British sailor Alex Thomson's Hugo Boss boat forces him out of the Transat Jacques Vabre race.
results.shortTitle: Keel damage forces Thomson out of race
results.title: Alex Thomson: British sailor forced out of Transat Jacques Vabre race by damaged keel

results.description: Great Britain windsurfing trio Tom Squires, Kieran Holmes-Martin and Andy Brown take on a Japanese quiz with food forfeits on a recent trip to Tokyo.
results.title: 'It tastes like a teabag' - GB windsurfers take on Japanese food challenge

results.description: Sailor Charlotte Dobson aims to mount "an attack on the podium" after being selected to represent Great Britain at the Tokyo 2020 Olympic Games.
results.title: Charlotte Dobson to 'attack' podium at Tokyo 2020

results.description: Olympic champions Hannah Mills and Giles Scott are among 12 sailors to be selected to represent Great Britain at the Tokyo 2020 Games.
results.shortTitle: Mills & Scott named in Tokyo 2020 squad
results.title: Tokyo 2020 Olympics: Hannah Mills & Giles Scott among 12 GB sailors selected

thumbnail.altText: Hannah Mills and Giles Scott split pic

results.description: Windsurfer Saskia Sills is struggling to believe her results in 2019 after finishing ninth at the world championships.
results.shortTitle: Sills joy at top 10 worlds finish
results.title: Saskia Sills: GB windsurfer delighted by top 10 world championships finish

results.description: Sailor Alex Thomson believes he has the boat to make him the first Briton to win the Vendee Globe round the world race.
results.shortTitle: Thomson unveils boat for 2020 Vendee Globe
results.title: Alex Thomson: British sailor unveils boat he hopes will win 2020 Vendee Globe

results.description: British sailor Alex Thomson has revealed the £6m boat he is hoping will win him the Vendee Globe next year.
results.title: Alex Thomson unveils £6m boat he hopes will take him to victory

results.description: British sailor Hannah Mills launches the Big Plastic Pledge after being "overwhelmed" by the "shocking" amount of waste she saw at the Rio 2016 Olympics.
results.shortTitle: Olympic sailor Mills launches plastic initiative
results.title: Hannah Mills: British sailor launches Big Plastic Pledge with IOC

results.description: Alison Young wins bronze as Great Britain finish with three medals at the World Cup Series in Enoshima.
results.shortTitle: GB's Young wins World Cup Series bronze
results.title: World Cup Series: Alison Young wins bronze as GB finish with three medals

thumbnail.altText: Alison Young with her bronze medal at the World Cup Series in Enoshima

results.description: James Peters and Fynn Sterritt win gold as British sailors claim two medals in the Hempel World Cup Series in Enoshima, Japan.
results.shortTitle: British pair keep World Cup Series title
results.title: World Cup Series: James Peters and Fynn Sterritt retain Enoshima 49er title

results.description: It has been a productive month for Olympic champion Hannah Mills and Eilidh McIntyre in their preparations for Tokyo 2020 gold.
results.shortTitle: Double medal success for Mills in Japan
results.title: Tokyo 2020: Double medal success for Hannah Mills in Olympic warm-up

thumbnail.altText: Eilidh McItyre and Hannah Mills celebrate victory at the 2019 470 World Championship

results.description: Great Britain finish the Olympic test event with three silver medals and three bronze after the final day was cut short due to a lack of wind.
results.shortTitle: GB end Olympic test event with six medals
results.title: Tokyo 2020: Hannah Mills and Eilidh McIntyre win silver as GB finish with six medals

results.description: Great Britain win four medals on the first day of medal racing at the Olympic test event in Enoshima, Japan.
results.shortTitle: GB win four medals in Olympic test event
results.title: Tokyo 2020: GB win four medals on first day of Olympic test event

results.description: Un marinero ruso lanzó al mar un mensaje en una botella hace 50 años y fue recientemente encontrado por un hombre en Alaska. Aquí te contamos qué ponía.
results.title: El mensaje en una botella que lanzó al mar un capitán soviético en 1969 y fue descubierto ahora en Alaska

results.description: How much did the sailors know about the catastrophic weather conditions they were facing in 1979?
results.title: Fastnest: 40 years on

thumbnail.altText: A Royal Navy helicopter rescues the crew of the yacht Camargue after the disastrous Fastnet yacht race in which 85 yachts went missing in force eleven hurricane winds, 14th August 1979.
A Royal Navy helicopter rescues the crew of the yacht Camargue after the disastrous Fastnet yacht race in which 85 yachts went missing in force eleven hurricane winds, 14th August 1979.

results.description: The Australia team win all three races in Cowes to return to the top of the SailGP table ahead of the Marseille finale.
results.shortTitle: Australia top table for SailGP finale
results.title: SailGP Cowes: Australia win all three races to top table again

thumbnail.altText: The British SailGP team racing in Cowes

results.description: Britain's Hannah Mills and Eilidh McIntyre win 470 World Championship gold in the Enoshima Yacht Harbour that will host next year's Olympic regatta.
results.shortTitle: Mills and McIntyre win World 470 title
results.title: Hannah Mills and Eilidh McIntyre win 470 World Championship title in Japan

thumbnail.altText: Eilidh McItyre and Hannah Mills celebrate victory at the 2019 470 World Championship

results.description: The event will see the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge go head-to-head as skippers of sailing boats.
results.shortTitle: Duke and Duchess's sailing race moved over weather
results.title: King's Cup: Duke and Duchess of Cambridge's sailing race moved

results.description: Ireland qualify for the Tokyo 2020 Olympic sailing regatta in the women's single-handed event.
results.shortTitle: Irish women qualify for Olympic sailing
results.title: Tokyo 2020: Ireland qualify for Olympics in women's single-handed event

results.description: Olympic sailing champion Hannah Mills says tackling the 'wacky' conditions at Tokyo 2020 could be the toughest challenge of her career.
results.shortTitle: 'Wacky' conditions at Tokyo 2020 could be Mills' toughest test
results.title: Rio champion Hannah Mills to 'put it all on the line' in Tokyo's 'wacky' conditions
